segments.name: Active Lead
segments.objective: Convert inquiries into qualified buyers and improve funnel conversion by 50%

campaigns.name: Website Exit Intent Popup
campaigns.objective: Capture contact details before visitor leaves
campaigns.triggerCondition: User moves cursor to close browser tab
campaigns.content: Special offer or market report to capture email

campaigns.name: First Property Search Alert
campaigns.triggerCondition: User performs first property search on website
campaigns.content: Instant search results with agent introduction

campaigns.name: Thank You Email
campaigns.content: Welcome email with next steps and what to expect

campaigns.name: WhatsApp Welcome Message
campaigns.triggerCondition: 2 hours after email if phone number provided
campaigns.content: Quick WhatsApp intro with agent contact

campaigns.name: For You Personalized
campaigns.content: Curated property listings based on stated preferences

campaigns.name: Agent Introduction Video
campaigns.objective: Build personal connection with assigned agent
campaigns.content: Personal video introduction from agent with local expertise

campaigns.name: Buyer's Guide Download
campaigns.objective: Educate and build trust with valuable content
campaigns.triggerCondition: 3 days after inquiry if no viewing booked
campaigns.content: Comprehensive first-time buyer guide PDF

campaigns.name: Agent Call Booking
campaigns.triggerCondition: Lead marked as qualified by agent
campaigns.content: Calendar link for consultation booking

campaigns.name: Rate Your Agent
campaigns.objective: Gather feedback and improve service quality
campaigns.content: 5-question survey about agent interaction and satisfaction

campaigns.name: Property Match Alert
campaigns.objective: Keep buyer engaged with fresh inventory
campaigns.content: Daily email with 3-5 newly listed matching properties

campaigns.name: WhatsApp Hot Property Alert
campaigns.triggerCondition: Property matches criteria and priced under budget
campaigns.content: Instant WhatsApp with property photo and key details

campaigns.name: Market Update Weekly
campaigns.objective: Position agent as market expert and keep buyer informed
campaigns.content: Local market stats, price trends, and neighborhood insights

campaigns.name: Mortgage Pre-approval Reminder
campaigns.objective: Ensure buyer can act quickly on properties
campaigns.triggerCondition: 3 days in qualified stage without pre-approval status
campaigns.content: Pre-approval benefits, lender recommendations, and application link

campaigns.name: Budget Discussion Follow-up
campaigns.content: Budget review, affordability calculator, and financing options

campaigns.name: Neighborhood Guides
campaigns.triggerCondition: 10 days after qualification, based on search areas
campaigns.content: Detailed neighborhood guides: schools, amenities, transport

campaigns.name: Video Property Tours
campaigns.content: Curated video tours of available properties

campaigns.name: Open House Invitations
campaigns.content: This weekend's open houses in your preferred areas

campaigns.name: Buyer Success Stories
campaigns.content: Testimonials and case studies from recent buyers

campaigns.name: Re-engagement Check-in
campaigns.triggerCondition: 14 days without property views or responses
campaigns.content: Personalized check-in with market update and new listings

campaigns.name: Agent Personal Call
campaigns.content: Task created for agent to make personal call

campaigns.name: Viewing Confirmation Email
campaigns.objective: Confirm viewing details and reduce no-shows
campaigns.content: Confirmation with property address, time, agent name, and preparation tips

campaigns.name: WhatsApp Viewing Reminder
campaigns.content: Friendly reminder with address, time, and agent contact

campaigns.name: Pre-Viewing Checklist
campaigns.content: What to look for, questions to ask, and red flags to notice

campaigns.name: Post-Viewing Feedback Survey
campaigns.objective: Capture immediate impressions and interest level
campaigns.content: Quick survey: property rating, interest level, concerns

campaigns.name: WhatsApp Quick Reaction
campaigns.content: Quick WhatsApp: thumbs up/down reaction request

campaigns.name: Similar Properties Suggestion
campaigns.content: 3-5 similar properties based on what they just saw

campaigns.name: Agent Follow-up Call Task
campaigns.content: Task created for agent to call and discuss

campaigns.name: Property Comparison Report
campaigns.triggerCondition: 2 days after viewing if viewed multiple properties
campaigns.content: Side-by-side comparison of viewed properties

campaigns.name: Neighborhood Deep Dive
campaigns.triggerCondition: 3 days after viewing if still interested
campaigns.content: Comprehensive neighborhood report for viewed property area

campaigns.name: Re-viewing Invitation
campaigns.triggerCondition: 7 days after initial viewing if high interest indicated
campaigns.content: Invitation to revisit property with different time/perspective

campaigns.name: Making an Offer Guide
campaigns.triggerCondition: Buyer expresses intent to make offer
campaigns.content: Comprehensive guide: offer strategy, terms, negotiation tips

campaigns.name: Offer Strategy Call
campaigns.content: Calendar invite for offer strategy discussion

campaigns.name: Comparative Market Analysis
campaigns.content: CMA report showing comparable sales and pricing recommendation

campaigns.name: Offer Submission Confirmation
campaigns.objective: Confirm offer submitted and set expectations
campaigns.content: Confirmation of offer details, next steps, and typical timeline

campaigns.name: WhatsApp Offer Status Updates
campaigns.content: Instant updates on offer status, counter-offers, acceptance

campaigns.name: Counter-Offer Negotiation Support
campaigns.content: Counter-offer analysis and response strategy

campaigns.name: Competing Offers Alert
campaigns.content: Alert about competition and best & final strategies

campaigns.name: Congratulations - Offer Accepted!
campaigns.objective: Celebrate success and outline next steps
campaigns.content: Celebration email with clear next steps in closing process

campaigns.name: WhatsApp Celebration Message
campaigns.content: Personal congratulations message from agent with next call

campaigns.name: Closing Process Timeline
campaigns.content: Visual timeline of closing process with key milestones

campaigns.name: Home Inspection Preparation
campaigns.content: What to expect during inspection, common issues, negotiation tips

campaigns.name: Recommended Service Providers
campaigns.content: List of recommended movers, contractors, utilities, insurance

campaigns.name: Weekly Closing Progress Update
campaigns.content: Progress report on inspections, appraisal, financing, title

campaigns.name: Pre-Closing Checklist
campaigns.content: Checklist of items to complete before closing day

campaigns.name: Closing Day Preparation
campaigns.content: What to bring, where to go, what to expect at closing

campaigns.name: Welcome Home Package
campaigns.content: Congratulations, home care tips, warranty info, agent availability

campaigns.name: Post-Closing Follow-up
campaigns.content: Check-in on settling in, request review/referral, ongoing support

campaigns.name: 30-Day Home Anniversary
campaigns.content: One-month homeowner check-in and home maintenance tips

segments.name: Dormant Open Lead
segments.objective: Re-engage inactive leads and improve funnel conversion by 50%

campaigns.name: We Haven't Heard From You
campaigns.content: Personalized re-engagement with market updates and new opportunities

campaigns.name: Market Changed Since You Looked
campaigns.objective: Highlight market changes as reason to re-engage
campaigns.content: Recent market shifts, price changes, new inventory in their areas

campaigns.name: New Properties Just Listed
campaigns.content: Fresh listings that match their original search criteria

campaigns.name: WhatsApp Quick Check-in
campaigns.content: Casual check-in asking if still looking or if circumstances changed

campaigns.name: Rate Drop Alert
campaigns.content: Mortgage rate drop notification with affordability impact

campaigns.name: We Haven't Heard From You
campaigns.triggerCondition: 21 days without engagement in qualified stage
campaigns.content: Check-in with agent, new matches, and market update

campaigns.name: Still Searching Question
campaigns.content: Survey: still looking? Timeline changed? How can we help?

campaigns.name: Agent Personal Outreach
campaigns.content: Task for agent to make personal call

campaigns.name: We Haven't Heard From You
campaigns.triggerCondition: 14 days since last viewing, no new viewing booked
campaigns.content: Check-in on viewed properties, offer to schedule more viewings

campaigns.name: Similar Properties Still Available
campaigns.triggerCondition: 18 days after viewing, no further action
campaigns.content: Properties similar to what they viewed, still on market

campaigns.name: We Haven't Heard From You
campaigns.objective: Check status after offer stage goes quiet
campaigns.triggerCondition: 7 days since offer discussion, no offer made
campaigns.content: Check-in on offer decision, offer support, address concerns

segments.name: Referral - Active Lead

campaigns.content: Thank you to referrer with confirmation we've contacted referral

campaigns.objective: Update referring agent on viewing activity
campaigns.content: Viewing feedback and progress update for referring agent

campaigns.name: Manual Agent Referral - Offer Status
campaigns.content: Offer details and status for referring agent

campaigns.name: Manual Agent Referral - Deal Closed
campaigns.content: Success notification with referral fee details

campaigns.name: 6-Month Home Anniversary
campaigns.content: Home care tips, market update, home value estimate

campaigns.name: Annual Home Value Update
campaigns.objective: Show home appreciation and stay top of mind
campaigns.content: Current market value, equity position, market trends

campaigns.name: Referral Request - Past Client
campaigns.content: Request for referrals with incentive program details

campaigns.name: Quarterly Market Newsletter
campaigns.objective: Stay top of mind with market updates
campaigns.content: Market trends, neighborhood updates, and tips

campaigns.name: Referral Source Commission Notice
